Doc: A type describing correlation bounds, which form a cap and a floor on the realized correlation.

Source.Contents:
/#
   A type describing correlation bounds, which form a cap and a floor on the realized correlation.
 #/
record FpML5.recordkeeping.BoundedCorrelation {
  # Minimum Boundary as a percentage of the Strike Price.
  minimumBoundaryPercent : decimal?

  # Maximum Boundary as a percentage of the Strike Price.
  maximumBoundaryPercent : decimal?

}

minimumBoundaryPercent.Doc: Minimum Boundary as a percentage of the Strike Price.
minimumBoundaryPercent.Name: minimumBoundaryPercent

maximumBoundaryPercent.Doc: Maximum Boundary as a percentage of the Strike Price.
maximumBoundaryPercent.Name: maximumBoundaryPercent
